channel.title: Peas on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Peas on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Strawberries are in for the 2008 season
item.description: via arborparents, a report that strawberries are in at Rowe's Produce Farm - head there from the Rawsonville Road exit, south to Martz Rd between Ypsi and Belleville. Price of strawberries is $1.43/lb. www.rowesproducefarm.com UPDATE: Peas too! Hello Rowe's Produce Farm customers, SUGAR SNAP PEAS ARE NOW READY TO BE PICKED!!!!! We opened our first field of sugar snap peas for picking today and they are LOADED. Now is the time to pick!
